verbs.description: Longtime Donald Trump fixer Michael Cohen [V: has] received word from federal prosecutors that they are preparing to arrest the New York City lawyer , MSNBC ’s Katy Tur reported Wednesday . Tur made the revelation to guest anchor Kristen Welker , minutes after speaking to a source close to Cohen .
